oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Department of Energy Photograph Collection
Oak Ridge Junior Football league
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A man holding a football stands with a group of teenage boys.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Football; Football players; Teenagers
Burgrabbe, Bill; Cornett, Harold; Dirl, Bill; Doane, Darrel; Dolan, Danny; Henderson, Bill; Lauter, Woodlief Sheperd "Shep"; Redden, Wayburn; Ryan, Lester; Wright, Tom
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: See Oak Ridge Journal article of October 18, 1945. First row on left is Wayburn Redden; Third from left is Danny Dolan and Bill Henderson is behind Danny Dolan. Second row, left to right; Shep Lauter, Lester Ryan, Tom Wright, Harold Cornett, darrel Doane, Bill Burgrabbe and Bill Dirl.
